recipesJson.name: Strawberry Banana Shake - DEAD SIMPLE
recipesJson.author: ENYAWREKLAW
recipesJson.description: A very simple Banana, Strawberry Smoothie. This recipe is part of the DEAD SIMPLE recipe series

reviews.text: I agree 💯 with FuriousMixer. Great vape.
For a simple recipe this is worth a bash 💯  decent amount of flavour and pretty well balanced. If you enjoy strawberry forward recipes with light banana then get on it! Good job Wayne 👍🏻
